title: Speak Text Block
body:
Speak Text Block¶

The Speak Text block is only available when designing a workflow for a voice campaign or when managing a workflow for a phone number .
This block allows you to play a spoken message using only text.
You can customize the voice by gender and accent (EN = English (currently the only language available), AU = Australian, GB = British, US = American).

  1. Place a Speak Text block in your workflow where desired

  2. Click the drop-down menu and select the name of the voice you desire

  3. Enter a message

  4. Click Speak Text to hear your audio

  5. When satisfied, click Done

  6. In the workflow, you can now click show more and Play text to hear your audio
